short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to hasten the class selection process for FIU students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterClass FIU is an extension which removes the hassle of having to individually search for professors on the Rate My Professor website. For the sake of simplicity, this extension displays the ratings of professors directly on Florida International University's class selection page. 

DISCLAIMER - This extension connects Rate My Professor and MyFIU but is not professionally affiliated with either. This project was made as capstone project and exists to soothe my own stresses when selecting classes.
